core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix corporate precision with energetic accents.
Emotion First: The user should feel 'Productive Clarity'.
Content is King: Every screen tells a story of efficiency.
Zoom In: Focus on the timer and the data.
Negative Space: Use white space to reduce cognitive load.
anti_patterns: No 'Inter' for headings (Use Plus Jakarta Sans).
No center-aligned text blocks longer than 3 lines.
No default 'Vercel' look - customize the radius and shadows.

headings.usage: All page titles, section headers, and modal titles.

mono.usage: Timer display, code snippets, API keys.

primary.name: Magenta Energy
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, progress bars, key highlights.

rules: Timer Widget: col-span-full md:col-span-2 row-span-2 (Hero of the dashboard)

landing_page.structure: Hero Section + Features Grid + Pricing + Footer
landing_page.hero_alignment: Left aligned text, Right aligned hero image (or 3D element)
rules: Use generous padding (py-20 or py-32) between sections.
Do not center everything. Use asymmetry to create tension.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300

cards.style: Flat with subtle border, no shadow by default. Hover: lift and shadow.
cards.classes: bg-card text-card-foreground border border-border rounded-lg hover:-translate-y-1 hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

inputs.classes: h-10 rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

timer.font: font-mono text-6xl md:text-8xl font-bold tracking-tighter text-foreground

images.description: Professional team collaborating in a modern office. Use as hero image or section background with overlay.
Minimalist desk setup. Use for 'Focus Mode' feature section.
Team meeting. Use for 'Company Management' feature section.

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Color: Muted foreground or Primary.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text meets WCAG AA standards. Magenta text on white must be large or bold.
accessibility.testing: All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes (e.g., data-testid='start-timer-btn').
